website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for something a little taller, this good quality pedestal from Kohler has a nice design and easy installation.
pros: Simple low lines on this sink include flat edges, which gives you a place to set items around the sink
Sink is designed to easily attach to the wall
cons: On the higher end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about a Kohler product? It's got clean lines and looks great. More pricey than other brands, but in my opinion worth it. Little differences make the product -- for example, the pedestal on this sink has an approximately one inch layer of porcelain at the base of it. So, instead of one continuous hollowed out piece (which many other brands have), it has a very solid base and balances much better on the floor. I was not incentivized to write this review, and I paid for this product. I just happen to love Kohler products, and this is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Livelovelaugh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and a Great look
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Kohler pedestal sink for a small bathroom we were renovating. A cabinet sink would be too big for the space so we were looking for a pedestal that had some space on top for putting soap and a hand towel. This sink was perfect. It's substantial and doesn't look too small, it arrived in perfect condition and looks clean and minimal in the bathroom, which is what we hoped for. Very nice quality for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Jones

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: The porcelain is high quality and the sink mounting holes are fine. However, I am NOT happy with the design of the sink-to-pedestal mounting. The top of the pedestal has a flat U shape. But the bottom of the sink has 'bumps' that prevent it from lying flush. IMHO, it really is a poor design.
customer_reviews.author: 12Care

customer_reviews.title: Elegant!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink! It goes with the French/modern style we are going for in our new master bath! Very solid looking product and has really pretty lines.
customer_reviews.author: CBSNgal

customer_reviews.title: Sink perfect, but higher than the old 80's pedestal by ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived perfectly in two huge double boxes from Amazon. Boxes so large I thought there was an accidental double order. Sink perfect, but higher than the old 80's pedestal by about 6". I had to purchase extenders for drain and extends from wall further than old sink. Looks Excellent! Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: John Carney

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and just right in size
customer_reviews.text: We put two of these in our children's bathroom. They are sleek and classy. The top is wide enough to put soap and a few essentials on without leaving enough room to be cluttered. I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: I really like the look of this sink for my small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this sink for my small bathroom. I wish it did not have the push drain though. We already had a clog and it was a little difficult to unclog because you can't easily snake the drain. I do love the look though.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C. Dupree

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sink and well built. Kohler puts out such a great product and this sink was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Cridertown

customer_reviews.title: Sink does not fit well
customer_reviews.text: Sink does not fit well, needed to work hard on adjusting it to look together. But it definitely does not fit.
customer_reviews.author: He

customer_reviews.title: lovely but...
customer_reviews.text: lovely and easy to plumb so will keep it. but WHY does the pedestal and sink not beautifully mesh when installed. No one will see it but that shouldn't be a reason for not getting the fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, yet cheap
customer_reviews.text: Stunning, beautiful, yet cheap, pedestal sink. We needed something small, yet commanding in our newly renovated guest bath. After much searching I stumbled on this beauty. Not overly pricey, yet still very stylish. Great finish, seems very durable and I'm sure it will look great for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Spoonerdee

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sink
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our basement remodel and it is a great sink. Looks great and has a lot of space around the edges for things like hand soap, a toothbrush holder, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Classy sink
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product by Kohler. A little larger than anticipated, but very solid and beautiful. I am not a huge fan of pedestal sinks, but this is a very nice one for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Volman

customer_reviews.title: I contacted Amazon and informed them about the defect and Amazon like they always do worked out a solution for me
customer_reviews.text: Kohler quality control should have picked up the defect but they didn't. Finished our basement and after the lights were turned on we noticed a couple of dings on the surface of the sink. The sink is fully installed and can't do much other than live with the defect. I contacted Amazon and informed them about the defect and Amazon like they always do worked out a solution for me. Will have to live with the defect, Kohler quality control a big thumbs down, Amazon customer service a big thumbs up, the best there is which is why I have been a loyal customer of Amazon since 2004. I would recommend fully inspecting the product once it arrives before installation.
customer_reviews.author: ferrari3338

customer_reviews.title: Oh Kohler, we Love You
customer_reviews.text: Looks as advertised. No shipping damage, in fact I guarantee this was ISTA3a certified packaging. Installing in the half bath in 2 days with a Kohler faucet.
customer_reviews.author: 789Ltr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful buy and looks great in our small bathroom. Its very sturdy and couldn't have been a better buy.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great classic look
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful in our vintage bathroom! We wanted a classic bathroom in our 1920s bathroom and this along with the toilet works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fine sink
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without any cracks. Installed by local plumber who had to preform additional surgery on our old pipes. An excellent product. We are very grateful for the comments of Amazon customers which led us in the right direction.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, and way cheaper than Home Depot from what I remember. I recommend this to anyone and everyone looking for a space saving sink solution!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks & works great
customer_reviews.text: After remodeling the bathroom with a new vanity and sink 'She who must be obeyed' decided she wanted a pedestal sink instead. I didn't like the ones at the big box stores so we ordered this one from Amazon. It arrived quickly and installed very easy, getting the plumbing connected was another story because there isnt much room back there. But with a little persistence we got it hooked up and it looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary & Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like the rectangular sink instead of the typical oval - kind of modernizes it
customer_reviews.author: Keds

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but was very difficult to install....the bowl doesn't fit right on the pedestal.
customer_reviews.author: wanda mckinney

customer_reviews.title: can't be happier of the whole set
customer_reviews.text: can't be happier of the whole set. Looks elegant and has enough counter space for soap dispenser and small bath room accessories. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: weimin sun

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. It ended up being too large for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. It ended up being too large for our tiny spare bedroom but we are keeping it for the next house.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I love the clean straight lines - perfect for my 1/2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the clean straight lines - perfect for my 1/2 bath tucked into a small space. My only suggestion is to make the pedestal a bit wider to cover the water lines.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for powder rooms. Gorgeous and exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: M. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous sink but annoying mounting instructions
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pedestal sink. Mounting could be a lot better since you have to dry fit it and squeeze your hand inside the crevices to mark drill holes with a stubby pencil (I was lucky to find a golf pencil handy). I have thick walls with tile on top of the drywall which needed a longer mounting screw. I got it to work but the screws really should be 1/2" longer. Also, the pedestal base seems to stand a bit further away from the wall than others I've seen. Depending on your bathroom, you may have the plumbing too exposed from the sides.
customer_reviews.author: anoopster

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap but worht every penny
customer_reviews.text: Kohler just makes such a great product ... worth a bit more than the usual stuff and it usually is.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Y. BOLING

customer_reviews.title: Looks great & priced right
customer_reviews.text: Great look, half the price of what it would have cost me in store, with 2 day free shipping, whats not to love!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, exactly what I wanted. Bright white and matched my toilet. Buying again when I remodel other bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bang for the buck! It has enough space around the sink to be usable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were delivered on time and look great in our new bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: good laptop

customer_reviews.title: The sink was crushed. The box had a small ...
customer_reviews.text: The sink was crushed. The box had a small indent and opened it before the UPS driver left. He took it with him. What a hassle!
customer_reviews.author: No better than tape

customer_reviews.title: Wow- great product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product- looks absolutely beautiful- makes a small bathroom look bigger and very elegant- it is a great price too comparing to Home depot
customer_reviews.author: Ivonka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is really nice. The classic look goes well in my half bath. I recommend this to anyone thinking of buying. I also purchased the Delta Faucet 3564-MPU-DST Ashlyn Two Handle Widespread Lavatory Faucet, Chrome, because the square design went well with the sink in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Quinton Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Sending this back!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this sink, but it was scratched across the front. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Very practical sized pedestal sink
customer_reviews.text: Very wide and deep sink basin, especially for a pedestal sink. Nice to have a ledge around it, to store a toothbrush and a cup. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: gymbok

customer_reviews.title: Misleading item description
customer_reviews.text: This item does not come with the pedestal. The description doesn't say it doesn't come with one. Also the picture shows it with the pedestal. For this price is should include the pedestal. This is poor advertising and misleading.
customer_reviews.author: david asay

product_meta.title: KOHLER K-2359-8-NY Archer Pedestal Bathroom Sink with 8" Centers, Dune
product_meta.description:
Color:DuneFROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Archer pedestal lavatory features transitional aesthetic of the Archer Suite, blending subtle design elements found in craftsman furniture's chamfering techniques and the intricate facets of jewelry.
feature_bullets: Combination consists of K-2358-8 lavatory and K-2357 pedestal
